description: Non-material amendment to planning permission PP/18/05254 (Variation of conditions 2 (Compliance with approved drawings) and 3 (Materials - to match existing) of planning permission PP/15/05214 (Variation of condition 2 (compliance with approved drawings) of planning permission 15/01718 for amended drawings reflecting the infill at lower ground floor lightwells, installation of staircase and revised plant scheme) for additional demolition, rebuilding of internal parts, removal and rebuilding of entire front facade, altered internal configuration, removal of reference to existing bricks and to source new bricks to match internal stock bricks.) for installation of new boiler flue and kitchen extraction, exceeding lift overrun by 1 metre in total.
